thread.title: O’Reilly: Trump ‘Needs Better Coordination Among His Staff’
thread.title_full: O’Reilly: Trump ‘Needs Better Coordination Among His Staff’

author: Josh Feldman
title: O’Reilly: Trump ‘Needs Better Coordination Among His Staff’
text:
O’Reilly: Trump ‘Needs Better Coordination Among His Staff’ by Josh Feldman | 8:22   
Tonight Bill O’Reilly began his show by reacting to the resignation of Michael Flynn and what it has illustrated to the public about how President Trump ‘s administration is currently functioning. 
He brought up how Kellyanne Conway was saying just yesterday afternoon that Flynn had Trump’s “full confidence,” making O’Reilly wonder if she was being misleading or simply didn’t know. 
O’Reilly said that Trump clearly needs “better coordination among his staff” and that Reince Priebus needs to step up the quality control and message discipline. 
He concluded that this kind of confusion doesn’t help the country and so “the Trump White House needs to become better organized.” 
Watch above, via Fox News.
